Suppose one of the visitors has a physical hygiene score of 0.88 on day
three. What is his / her standardized score (z-score)?

Answerlist
----------
* -0.14
* -0.28
* -3.38
* -4.01
* -1.24

Solution
========





The formula is: z = (observation - mean) / standard deviation  
  
Thus, z = (0.88 - 0.98) / 0.71 = -0.14
